attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is not a satirical petition. Mr Brown unfortunately does not seem to wear his suits well. They appear to be very ill tailored. Given his important status, we believe that he should be dressed well (as was his predecessor) as he represents the country. He need not wear overly expensive attire - only attire which suits him well. If deemed necessary, the Prime Minister should receive allowances to buy clothes fit for his office.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
